channel.title: Game frame problem
channel.description:
hey mopar if i wanna change the pictures of my client layout/gameframe the picture outside of the world map (or how i call that ?) dont change ? how can ill change it ?
sorry for bad english im dutch ;)
, ths-privates

item.title: Game frame problem
item.dc:creator: @ths-privates ths-privates
item.description:
@ths-privates wrote:

i didnt resize i just recolor but it stays the old collors (only at the frame from the map)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2009, 12:48:07 am[/size][hr]someone nows it already ??

Read full topic

item.title: Game frame problem
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

Oo. So go into the “Sprites” folder. Press “edit” on the picture you want, but keep it the size it is, streching it will mess up your client. You can re-color, edit or make even your custom gameframe!

Read full topic
